title: Jersey
writer: Mayank Jain, Gaibandhar Chele Raton, Wajid Shaikh
short_cast: Shahid Kapoor, Mrunal Thakur, Pankaj Kapur, Ronit Kamra, Anjum Batra, Gitika Mahendru, Abhishek Madrecha
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Mrunal Thakur, Pankaj Kapur, Ronit Kamra, Anjum Batra, Gitika Mahendru, Abhishek Madrecha
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Sports Movies, Sports Dramas
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: Ten years after quitting cricket, a gifted but dejected ex-batsman pursues a spot on the national team, hoping to fulfill his son's wish for a jersey.
